If you want to play as a killer, you should be prepared to:
- get looped till daylight
- get t-bagged 24/7
- get blinded by flashlights 24/7

If you want to play as a survivor, you should be prepared to:
- be camped
- be tunneled
- die inside when other survivors farm you

People might say that this or that is overpowered, but to be honest it's all about how you can outsmart your oponent.

For those who are considering to buy - It's a fun game, that makes your heart pump faster. Different kind of perks/abilities that improve your advantage and gameplay. As with any multiplayer game, there are toxic players, but it's unavoidable. 
The game constantly is overing around 50k players playing, doesn't take long to be in the game.

Be sneaky and be deadly!
Не смотря на все недочёты этой игры, для меня это игра будет лучшей из лучшей, а иначе у меня не было бы столько наигранного времени. Хотите покупайте хотите нет, дело каждого.

Dead By Daylight is a really fun game to play with friends, but with randoms it's not that great because you can't communicate with them. Camping killers are also really annoying to deal with. I would still recommend buying it!

I genuinely find this game fun. I've basically been playing it religiously for a year and feel pretty good at the game now. Through all the bugs, I still have a positive experience and enjoy playing with friends or playing as killer. I do wish that the dev's would focus more on the dedicated server experience or just overall game health for both killer/survivor rather than focusing on 'new content'. It has gotten better with the dedicated servers, but I still like there's a far ways to go compared to peer-to-peer connection (like it was before; in respect to getting hit through windows, some perks not always working, etc). I see the full potential for this game if it worked perfectly and completely as intended, which is why I keep playing.

If you enjoy PvP this is a pretty good game. There is definitely some toxicity but you'll be hard pressed to find a PvP game where that isn't present. Lots of different tactics from both the survivor and killer aspect. Overall it is a pretty good game.

Из года в год эти фуфелы из бхвр деградируют вместе с игрой со скоростью света, принимая игроков за стадо, которое все схавает и попросит добавки очередной порции багов, лагов и мертвых матерей разработчиков, этот проект уничтожит сам себя, если не перейдет под руководство новой компании, что врятли, потому что канадские поросята, ни за что не отдадут дойную корову, приносящую огромную порцию шекелей на бесполезных скинчиках, за последние года игра стала казуальней некуда, скоро будем нажимать одну кнопку и радоваться, однозначно не рекомендую, особенно для новых игроков, есть более достойные проекты, не тратьте время, деньги и нервы

Easy to play, hard to master. Anyone can run around in circles, but not everyone can juke.
Fun 2 play with friends. Its alright as a solo, but you need to get used to how to play survivor the most efficient way, looping etc.

I Was Absolutely Sold When The Halloween Chapter Was Announced Back in 2017, Bought it for my PS4 when it dropped.  Been Playing It Ever Since Then, Also Built A PC to Play This Game an a Few Other Titles.
Отличная и атмосферная игра! Сервера конечно подводят. Но все же - хороша чертовка.
It's a buggy, infuriating mess of a game filled with angry people, but it's addicting enough to overlook the downsides. Worth the purchase.

Querida comunidad de Steam vengo a dar mi humilde opinion sobre este  juego, para empezar opino que el precio es medio elevado para la cantidad de bug y error que tiene, creo que primero deben corregir esas cosas antes de aumentar el precio(Esta caro el km de pan). Segundo y ultimo punto acabo de jugar una partida con 800ping y escape igual, es decir la dificultad es mediocre, encima no le deseo a nadie en el mundo compartir una partida con "Veno Of Fire" el chabon no cura, no repara y encima no loopea bien, el killer lo mata a los dos segundos y cuando se decide a rescatar lo hace frente al killer. Pienso seriamente que esta asociado al killer en un plan contra los supeviventes, porque al final de la partida se rie de nosotros, Bannear del juego a "Veno of Fire"(Juega Minecraft)
